member.name: M:ConsoleApplication4.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: This main method explores "if" statements, ternary if statements, for loops, while loops (pre-test loop), do-while loops (post-test loop), and the use of "break" and/or "continue" statements.
member.author: Jodi A De Grave
member.remarks: Since this is an excercise in control structures, the code here is not as efficient as it could be; for example, using the mod(modulus) operator) instead of a step (increment) of += 2.
member.param: This is a string array from the command line prompts.
member.returns: Returns nothing -- since voide is specified.
